intro.name: L.E.Santhosh Kumar
intro.subHeading: I design and build web applications with a focus on modern web technologies.

about: With over 11 years of experience in Java and ReactJS development, I specialize in building scalable architectures, robust backend services, and dynamic front-end interfaces. I have led projects that improved system performance, security, and user engagement, delivering high-quality software across diverse domains.

**Notable achievements include:**- Developing a web-based emulator for AS400, modernizing legacy systems using ReactJS and Spring Boot.- Implementing Elasticsearch-powered search, increasing data retrieval speed and accuracy.- Designing a sports game simulation module that reduced testing time by 70%, accelerating release cycles.

I have also worked on critical security implementations like MSSQL Always On encryption and identity integration via OKTA, ensuring compliance and system resilience. My strength lies in full-stack engineering, system optimization, and driving secure, maintainable codebases.
Beyond full-stack development, Iâ€™m a passionate solo game developer, currently exploring Unreal Engine and Blender to build immersive 2D/3D game worlds, inspired by my favorite RPGs.
